ygData.subject: RE: Charm song...
ygData.msgSnippet: Hehe, what luck!  I made 27 last knight too!  (Lost it though grrr....... but I have an avo charm and will see if I can buy it back from the Centies ... Thanks
ygData.messageBody:
Hehe, what luck! I made 27 last knight too! (Lost it though grrr.......
but I have an avo charm and will see if I can buy it back from the Centies
:-)

Thanks you John Kim! I love you man! Here, you can have all my
BlackBurrowStout-Lites!

Sylly Songsynger
Bard of the 26.99999999999th song
<Spirit of the Moon>
somewhere on Innoruuk


-----Original Message-----
From: kim@... [mailto:kim@...]
Sent: Monday, September 20, 1999 2:40 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Charm song...

From: <kim@...>

On Mon, 20 Sep 1999, Steven S. Klug wrote:

> My alter ego, Laluni Songhammer has just made 27th! I now
have the lovely
> charm song. So my question to all you higher level bards
is, what is the
> best strategy for using it 1) to solo stuff, and 2) in a
group (if at all?)

Sneak preview of the guide I'm writing:

27 - Song of the Sirens
Effect: Charm
Instrument: Wind, unknown enhancement
Target: Target
Does not stack with: Enchanter's mesmerize line of spells
Taunt: Very high

Quantified: Charms the target turning it into your pet for
anywhere from
0 to about 15 seconds. Using a wind instrument has an
unknown effect, if
any. High charisma is supposed to help with success rate
and duration.


Comments: This song will revitalize your ability to solo.
At this level
